characters.name: Clara

relic: Champion of Streetwise Boxing + Musketeer of Wild Wheat
lightCone: On the Fall of an Aeon(S5)

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

materials: Broken Teeth of Iron Wolf x 66

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Highest damage ceiling in the game,
Unparalleled AoE damage output,
Very strong even against a single target,
Very durable character that can shrug off debilitating effects,
Destroys pretty much everything in the game without issue.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Outside of ultimate, you have somewhat limited control over her damage output,
Demands to be hit to find the most success,
Team limitations arise, limiting the choice of Preservation characters.

skills.name: I Want to Help
skills.skillContent: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Clara's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Svarog Watches Over You
skills.skillContent: Deals Physical DMG equal to 60/120/132% of Clara's ATK to all enemies, and additionally deals Physical DMG equal to 60/120/132% of Clara's ATK to enemies marked by Svarog with a Mark of Counter. All Marks of Counter will be removed after this Skill is used.

skills.name: Promise, Not Command
skills.skillContent: After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra 15/25/27%, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s). In addition, Svarog's Counter is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a Counter, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by 96/160/173%. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced Counter(s) can take effect 2 time(s).

skills.name: Because We're Family
skills.skillContent: Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara when hit by enemy attacks is reduced by 10%. Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with his Mark of Counter and retaliate with a Counter, dealing Physical DMG equal to 80/160/176% of Clara's ATK.

skills.name: Small Price For Victory
skills.skillContent: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, the chance Clara will be attacked by enemies increases for 2 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Kinship
majorTraces.skillContent: When attacked, this character has a 35% fixed chance to remove a debuff placed on them.

majorTraces.name: Under Protection
majorTraces.skillContent: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.

majorTraces.name: Revenge
majorTraces.skillContent: Increase Svarog's Counter DMG by 30%.

characters.name: Natasha
materials: Broken Teeth of Iron Wolf x 50

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: The only free healer,
Powerful generalist support kit,
Rare source of Cleanse that is invaluable against certain enemies,
Regen provides additional unconditional healing.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Healing output is not as impressive as Bailu,
Regens are only effective if you live until your next turn.

skills.name: Behind the Kindness
skills.skillContent: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Love, Heal, and Choose
skills.skillContent: Restores a single ally for 7/10/11% of Natasha's Max HP plus 70/280/312. Restores the ally for another 5/7/8% of Natasha's Max HP plus 48/192/214 at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Gift of Rebirth
skills.skillContent: Heals all allies for 9/14/15% of Natasha's Max HP plus 92/368/409.

skills.name: Innervation
skills.skillContent: When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by 25/50/55%. This effect also works on continuous healing.

skills.name: Hypnosis Research
skills.skillContent: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Physical DMG equal to 80% of Natasha's ATK to a random enemy, with a 100% base chance to Weaken all enemies. While Weakened, enemies deal 30% less DMG to allies for 1 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Soothe
majorTraces.skillContent: The Skill removes 1 debuff(s) from a target ally.

majorTraces.name: Healer
majorTraces.skillContent: Natasha's Outgoing Healing increases by 10%.

majorTraces.name: Recuperation
majorTraces.skillContent: Increases the duration of her Skill's continuous healing effect for 1 turn(s).

characters.name: Sushang

relic: Champion of Streetwise Boxing + Musketeer of Wild Wheat

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

materials: Broken Teeth of Iron Wolf x 50

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Good single-target damage output,
Fantastic breaker,
Turn advance allows her to act far more frequently and can offset weak AoE.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Very skill point hungry,
She’s subject to RNG if the enemy is not weakness broken.

skills.name: Cloudfencer Art: Starshine
skills.skillContent: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Cloudfencer Art: Mountainfall
skills.skillContent: Deals Physical DMG equal to 105/210/231% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a 33% chance to trigger Sword Stance on the final hit, dealing Additional Physical DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Sushang's ATK to the enemy. If the enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Sword Stance is guaranteed to trigger.

skills.name: Shape of Taixu: Dawn Herald
skills.skillContent: Deals Physical DMG equal to 192/320/346% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy and immediately Advances her action forward by 100%. In addition, Sushang's ATK increases by 18/30/32% and using her Skill has 2 extra chances to trigger Sword Stance for 2 turn(s). Sword Stance triggered from the extra chances deals 50% of the original DMG.

skills.name: Dancing Blade
skills.skillContent: When an enemy has their Weakness Broken on the field, Sushang's SPD increases by 15/20/21% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Cloudfencer Art: Warcry
skills.skillContent: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Sushang deals Physical DMG equal to 80% of her ATK to all enemies.

majorTraces.name: Guileless
majorTraces.skillContent: When current HP percentage is 50% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

majorTraces.name: Riposte
majorTraces.skillContent: For every Sword Stance triggered, the DMG dealt by Sword Stance increases by 2.5%. Stacks up to 10 time(s).

majorTraces.name: Vanquisher
majorTraces.skillContent: After using Basic ATK or Skill, if there are enemies on the field with Weakness Break, Sushang's action is Advanced Forward by 15%.

relic: Champion of Streetwise Boxing + Musketeer of Wild Wheat
lightCone: On the Fall of an Aeon(S5)

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: Fighting Will > Ready for Battle > Perseverance

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Versatile damage dealer in the early game,
You’ll get all their eidolons for free by just playing,
Role flexibility within Simulated Universe,
Out of combat party healing

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Single-target damage lags significantly beyond early game,
Completely overshadowed by their Preservation variant,
Needs time to stack their talent to deal better damage

skills.name: Farewell Hit
skills.skillContent: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50/100/110% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: RIP Home Run
skills.skillContent: Deals Physical DMG equal to 62/125/137% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Stardust Ace
skills.skillContent:
Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to 300/450/480% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy. Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to 180/270/288% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to 108/162/172% of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Perfect Pickoff
skills.skillContent: Each time the Trailblazer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the Trailblazer's ATK increases by 10/20/22%. This effect stacks up to 2 time(s).

skills.name: Immortal Third Strike
skills.skillContent: Immediately heals all allies for 15% of their respective Max HP after using this Technique.

majorTraces.name: Ready for Battle
majorTraces.skillContent: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

majorTraces.name: Perseverance
majorTraces.skillContent: Each stack of Talent increases the Trailblazer's DEF by 10%.

majorTraces.name: Fighting Will
majorTraces.skillContent: When using Skill or Ultimate Blowout: RIP Home Run, DMG dealt to the target enemy is increased by 25%.

lightCone: Carve the Moon, Weave the Clouds(S1)

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: General support with good attack buffs,
Able to boost Speed with her ultimate,
Great Breaker with her skill against single targets,
Has limited damage over time for more offensive utility.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Expensive ultimate, Lower value when not facing fire-weak foes,
Skill can hit inconsistently in AoE scenarios.

skills.name: Spectrum Beam
skills.skillContent: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Asta's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Meteor Storm
skills.skillContent: Deals Fire DMG equal to 25/50/55% of Asta's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG for 4 extra times, with each time dealing Fire DMG equal to 25/50/55% of Asta's ATK to a random enemy.

skills.name: Astral Blessing
skills.skillContent: Increases SPD of all allies by 36/50/53 for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Astrometry
skills.skillContent: Gains 1 stack of Charging for every different enemy hit by Asta plus an extra stack if the enemy hit has Fire Weakness. For every stack of Charging Asta has, all allies' ATK increases by 7/14/15%, up to 5 time(s). Starting from her second turn, Asta's Charging stack count is reduced by 3 at the beginning of every turn.

skills.name: Miracle Flash
skills.skillContent: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of Asta's ATK to all enemies.

majorTraces.name: Sparks
majorTraces.skillContent: Asta's Basic ATK has a 80% base chance to Burn enemies for 3 turn(s), making the enemy take Fire DoT equal to 50% of Asta's Basic ATK DMG at the start of each turn.

majorTraces.name: Ignite
majorTraces.skillContent: When Asta is on the field, all allies' Fire DMG increases by 18%.

majorTraces.name: Constellation
majorTraces.skillContent: Asta's DEF increases by 6% for every current Charging stack she possesses.

relic: Firesmith of Lava-Forging + Musketeer of Wild Wheat

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Top tier AoE damage,
Decent single-target damage,
Burn DoT allows for consistent damage contribution,
Can work as a hypercarry with proper investment,
Demolishes farming and auto content.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Relies on Traces for maximum performance so can struggle early on,
While still good, her single-target damage is still lower than dedicated single-target characters.

skills.name: Sawblade Tuning
skills.skillContent: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Molten Detonation
skills.skillContent: Deals Fire DMG equal to 100/200/220% of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG equal to 40/80/88% of Himeko's ATK to any adjacent enemies.

skills.name: Heavenly Flare
skills.skillContent: Deals Fire DMG equal to 138/230/248% of Himeko's ATK to all enemies. Himeko regenerates 5 extra Energy for each enemy defeated.

skills.name: Victory Rush
skills.skillContent: When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge (max 3 points). If Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 follow-up attack and deals Fire DMG equal to 70/140/154% of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points. At the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.

skills.name: Incomplete Combustion
skills.skillContent: After using Technique, creates a dimension that lasts for 15 second(s). After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a 100% base chance to increase Fire DMG taken by enemies by 10% for 2 turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

majorTraces.name: Starfire
majorTraces.skillContent: After using an attack, there is a 50% base chance to inflict Burn on enemies for 2 turn(s). When afflicted with Burn, enemies take Fire DoT equal to 30% of Himeko's ATK at the start of each turn.

majorTraces.name: Magma
majorTraces.skillContent: Skill deals 20% more DMG to enemies currently afflicted with Burn.

majorTraces.name: Benchmark
majorTraces.skillContent: When current HP percentage is 80% or higher, CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

relic: Firesmith of Lava-Forging + Musketeer of Wild Wheat
lightCone: On the Fall of an Aeon(S5)

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Fantastic single-target damage output,
Really well designed and synergistic kit,
Consistent damage over time thanks to endless burn,
Great energy economy.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Requires ramp-up time which can be detrimental in modes where time is of the essence,
Mostly single-target with only decent AoE,
Still loses to actual Hunt units in single-target dps.

skills.name: Hehe! Don't Get Burned!
skills.skillContent: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
skills.skillContent: Deals Fire DMG equal to 140/280/308% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy, with a 100% base chance to Burn them for 2 turn(s) and deals Fire DMG equal to 40/80/88% of Hook's ATK to enemies adjacent to it. When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to 25/65/71% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Boom! Here Comes the Fire!
skills.skillContent: Deals Fire DMG equal to 240/400/432% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy. After using her Ultimate, the next Skill to be used is Enhanced, which deals DMG to a target enemy and any adjacent enemies.

skills.name: Ha! Oil to the Flames!
skills.skillContent: When attacking a target afflicted with Burn, deals Additional Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Hook's ATK and regenerates 5 extra Energy.

skills.name: Ack! Look at This Mess!
skills.skillContent: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Hook deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of her ATK to a random enemy. In addition, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Burn on every enemy for 3 turn(s). When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to 50% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

majorTraces.name: Innocence
majorTraces.skillContent: Hook restores HP equal to 5% of her Max HP whenever her Talent is triggered.

majorTraces.name: Naivete
majorTraces.skillContent: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.

majorTraces.name: Playing With Fire
majorTraces.skillContent: When using her Ultimate, Hook has her action Advanced Forward by 20% and Hook additionally regenerates 5 Energy.

lightCone: Day One of My New Life (S1)

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: The Strong Defend the Weak > Action Beats Overthinking > Unwavering Gallantry

lightCone: Day One of My New Life (S1)

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: The Strong Defends the Weak > Action Beats Overthinking > Unwavering Gallantry

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Fantastic support with great shielding, damage, and breaking,
Versatile build paths,
Dual scaling,
AoE Taunt skill,
Invaluable in endgame content like Simulated Universe and Forgotten Hall,
All Eidolons will be unlocked just by playing.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Shields have lower hp compared to other shielders.

skills.name: Ice-Breaking Light
skills.skillContent: Consumes 4 stacks of Magma Will to enhance Basic ATK, dealing Fire DMG equal to 90/135/146% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG to equal to 36/54/58% of the Trailblazer's ATK to adjacent enemies.

skills.name: Ever-Burning Amber
skills.skillContent: Increases the Trailblazer's DMG Reduction by 40/50/52% and gains 1 stack of Magma Will, with a 100% base chance to Taunt all enemies for 1 turn(s).

skills.name: War-Flaming Lance
skills.skillContent: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of the Trailblazer's ATK plus 75/150/165% of the Trailblazer's DEF to all enemies. The next Basic ATK will be automatically enhanced and does not cost Magma Will.

skills.name: Treasure of the Architects
skills.skillContent: Each time the Trailblazer is hit, they gain 1 stack of Magma Will for a max of 8 stack(s). When Magma Will has no fewer than 4 stacks, the Trailblazer's Basic ATK becomes enhanced, dealing DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it. When the Trailblazer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, apply a Shield to all allies that absorbs DMG equal to 4/6/6% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus 20/80/89. The Shield lasts for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Call of the Guardian
skills.skillContent: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, gains a Shield that absorbs DMG equal to 30% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus 384 for 1 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: The Strong Defend the Weak
majorTraces.skillContent: After using the Skill, the DMG taken by all allies reduces by 15% for 1 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Unwavering Gallantry
majorTraces.skillContent: Using Enhanced Basic ATK restores the Trailblazer's HP by 5% of their Max HP.

majorTraces.name: Action Beats Overthinking
majorTraces.skillContent: When the Trailblazer is protected by a Shield at the beginning of the turn, increases ATK by 15% and regenerates 5 Energy until the action is over.

lightCone: Day One of My New Life (S1)

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: DEF% > Speed > Effect Hit Rate > HP%

lightCone: Day One of My New Life (S1)

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: DEF% > Speed > Effect Hit Rate > HP%

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Colossal shields that cover all allies,
Great energy economy,
Good skill point generator,
Potential CC bot if you build into it.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Completely useless talent, and a Major Trace is wasted attempting to fix it,
His shields are complete overkill for overworld content.

skills.name: Fist of Conviction
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Gepard's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Intimidating Strike
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 100/200/220% of Gepard's ATK to a single enemy, with a 65% base chance to Freeze that enemy for 1 turn(s). While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Ice DoT equal to 30/60/66% of Gepard's ATK each turn.

skills.name: Enduring Bulwark
skills.skillContent: Apply a Shield to all allies, absorbing DMG equal to 30/45/48% of Gepard's DEF plus 150/600/668 for 3 turn(s).

skills.name: Unyielding Will
skills.skillContent: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming incapacitated, Gepard's HP immediately restores 25/50/55% of his Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per battle.

skills.name: Comradery
skills.skillContent: After using Gepard's Technique, when the next battle begins, applies a shield to all allies, absorbing DMG equal to 24% of Gepard's DEF plus 150 for 2 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Integrity
majorTraces.skillContent: Gepard has a higher chance to be attacked by enemies.

majorTraces.name: Commander
majorTraces.skillContent: When Unyielding Will is triggered, Gepard's Energy will be restored to 100%.

majorTraces.name: Fighting Spirit
majorTraces.skillContent: Gepard's ATK increases by 35% of his current DEF. This effect will refresh at the start of each turn.

relic: Hunter of Glacial Forest + Musketeer of Wild Wheat

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Good farming unit for Calyx and Auto content.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Literally everything else.

skills.name: What Are You Looking At?
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Herta's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: One-Time Offer
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Herta's ATK to all enemies. If the enemy's HP percentage is 50% or higher, DMG dealt to this target increases by 20%.

skills.name: It's Magic, I Added Some Magic
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 120/200/216% of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

skills.name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
skills.skillContent: When an ally's attack causes an enemy's HP percentage to fall to 50% or lower, Herta will launch a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to 25/40/43% of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

skills.name: It Can Still Be Optimized
skills.skillContent: After using her Technique, Herta's ATK increases by 40% for 3 turn(s) at the beginning of the next battle.

majorTraces.name: Efficiency
majorTraces.skillContent: When Skill is used, the DMG Boost effect on target enemies increases by an extra 25%.

majorTraces.name: Puppet
majorTraces.skillContent: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.

majorTraces.name: Icing
majorTraces.skillContent: When Ultimate is used, deals 20% more DMG to Frozen enemies.

lightCone: Day One of My New Life (S1)

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: DEF% > Speed > Effect Hit Rate > HP%

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Massive single-target shield that lasts a long time,
Single-target Cleanse on her skill,
Increased aggro on targets she shields with her skill,
AoE Freeze on her ultimate,
Counters provide great bonus energy,
Great synergy with other Shielders,
Great synergy with Clara.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Her shield does not guarantee enemies hitting into it,
You cannot build into both Freeze and Shield strength—hybridising results in being weak at both,
Loses value against enemies that are resistant to Freeze.

skills.name: Frigid Cold Arrow
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of March 7th's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: The Power of Cuteness
skills.skillContent: Provides a single ally with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 38/57/61% of March 7th's DEF plus 190/760/846 for 3 turn(s). If the ally's HP is 30% of their Max HP or higher, greatly increases the chance of enemies attacking that ally.

skills.name: Glacial Cascade
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 90/150/162% of March 7th's ATK to all enemies. Hit enemies have a 50% base chance to be Frozen for 1 turn(s). While Frozen, the enemy cannot act and will recieve additional Ice DMG equal to 30/60/66% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Girl Power
skills.skillContent: After a shielded ally is attacked by an enemy, March 7th immediately Counters, dealing Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of her ATK. This effect can be triggered 2 time(s) each turn.

skills.name: Freezing Beauty
skills.skillContent: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a 100% base chance to Freeze a random enemy for 1 turn(s). While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Additional Ice DMG equal to 50% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

majorTraces.name: Purify
majorTraces.skillContent: Skill removes 1 debuff from an ally.

majorTraces.name: Reinforce
majorTraces.skillContent: The duration of the Shield generated from her Skill is extended for 1 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Ice Spell
majorTraces.skillContent: Increases Ultimate's base chance to Freeze enemies by 15%.

lightCone: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat(S1)

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: The Secret Strategy > Bash = Wipe Out

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Massive DEF shred that amplifies the whole team’s damage,
Able to dispel enemies with her skill,
Good energy economy,
Strong support scaling.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Requires a proper team to benefit from her,
Mediocre damage output.

skills.name: Frost Shot
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Pela's ATK as to a single enemy.

skills.name: Frostbite
skills.skillContent: Removes 1 buff(s) and deals Ice DMG equal to 105/210/231% of Pela's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Zone Suppression
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 60/100/108% of Pela's ATK to all enemies, with a base chance of 100% to inflict the Exposed on all enemies. When Exposed, enemies' DEF is reduced by 30/40/42% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Data Collecting
skills.skillContent: If the enemy is debuffed after Pela's attack, Pela will restore 5/10/11 extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.

skills.name: Preemptive Strike
skills.skillContent: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Pela deals Ice DMG equal to 80% of her ATK to a random enemy, with a 100% base chance of lowering the DEF of all enemies by 20% for 2 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Bash
majorTraces.skillContent: Deals 20% more DMG to debuffed enemies.

majorTraces.name: The Secret Strategy
majorTraces.skillContent: When Pela is on the battlefield, all allies' Effect Hit Rate increases by 10%.

majorTraces.name: Wipe Out
majorTraces.skillContent: Using Skill to remove buff(s) increases the DMG of Pela's next attack by 20%.

relic: Hunter of Glacial Forest + Musketeer of Wild Wheat

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: Icing on the Kick > Gentle Blade > Frost Favors the Brave

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Fantastic free stats that allow for great scaling,
Decimates early game due to his talent being overkill,
Has crowd-control with Freeze without needing to build into it.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Performs best with a specific team setup shielding him often,
Can end up being very resource hungry to successfully maintain his talent.

skills.name: Frost Thorn
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Darting Ironthorn
skills.skillContent: Deals Ice DMG equal to 110/220/242% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Soulsteel Sync for 1 turn.

skills.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
skills.skillContent: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by 60%. When Soulsteel Sync is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra 30/50/54% for 1 turn. Afterwards, deals Ice DMG equal to 210/350/378% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: One With the Sword
skills.skillContent: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Yanqing is less likely to be attacked by enemies. Yanqing's CRIT Rate increases by 15/20/21% and his CRIT DMG increases by 15/30/33%. After Yanqing attacks an enemy, there is a 50/60/62% fixed chance to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to 25/50/55% of Yanqing's ATK to the enemy, which has a 65% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn. The Frozen target cannot take action and receives Additional Ice DMG equal to 25/50/55% of Yanqing's ATK at the beginning of each turn. When Yanqing receives DMG, the Soulsteel Sync effect will disappear.

skills.name: The One True Sword
skills.skillContent: After using his Technique, at the start of the next battle, Yanqing deals 30% more DMG for 2 turn(s) to enemies whose current HP is 50% or higher.

majorTraces.name: Icing on the Kick
majorTraces.skillContent: When Yanqing attacks, deals additional Ice DMG equal to 30% of Yanqing's ATK to targets with Ice Weakness.

majorTraces.name: Frost Favors the Brave
majorTraces.skillContent: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Effect RES increases by 20%.

majorTraces.name: Gentle Blade
majorTraces.skillContent: When a CRIT Hit is triggered, increases SPD by 10% for 2 turn(s).

characters.name: Arlan

lightCone: On the Fall of an Aeon(S5)

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

materials: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow x 50

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Zero direct skill point consumption,
Strong early game.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Consumes skill points by proxy, since he demands shields and/or heals to survive,
Demands too many resources,
Weak in AoE,
Falls off very hard.

skills.name: Lightning Rush
skills.skillContent: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Shackle Breaker
skills.skillContent: Consumes Arlan's HP equal to 15% of his Max HP to deal Lightning DMG equal to 120/240/264% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy. If Arlan does not have sufficient HP, his HP will be reduced to 1 after using his Skill.

skills.name: Frenzied Punishment
skills.skillContent: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 192/320/346% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 96/160/173% of Arlan's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Pain and Anger
skills.skillContent: Increases Arlan's DMG for every percent of HP below his Max HP, up to a max of 36/72/79% more DMG.

skills.name: Swift Harvest
skills.skillContent: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 80% of Arlan's ATK to all enemies.

majorTraces.name: Revival
majorTraces.skillContent: If the current HP percentage is 30% or lower when defeating an enemy, immediately restores HP equal to 20% of Max HP.

majorTraces.name: Endurance
majorTraces.skillContent: The chance to resist DoT Debuffs increases by 50%.

majorTraces.name: Repel
majorTraces.skillContent: Upon entering battle, if Arlan's HP is less than or equal to 50%, he can nullify all DMG received except for DoT until after he is attacked.

characters.name: Bailu

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: Vidyadhara Ichor Lines > Aquatic Benediction > Qihuang Analects

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: Vidyadhara Ichor Lines > Aquatic Benediction > Qihuang Analects

materials: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow x 66

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Best healer on release (but we only have 2, so it’s not as amazing as it sounds initially),
Has a revive mechanic for if you mess up in a fight,
Invigorate provides immediate healing after taking damage and can further mitigate damage directly.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Lacking a cleanse is devastating for certain enemy and boss encounters,
The moment a healer with more utility get released, Bailu will likely be superseded by them.

skills.name: Diagnostic Kick
skills.skillContent: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Bailu's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Singing Among Clouds
skills.skillContent: Heals a single ally for 8/11/12% of Bailu's Max HP plus 78/312/347. Bailu then heals random allies 2 time(s). After each healing, HP restored from the next healing is reduced by 15%.

skills.name: Felicitous Thunderleap
skills.skillContent: Heals all allies for 9/13/14% of Bailu's Max HP plus 90/360/401. Bailu applies Invigoration to allies that are not already Invigorated. For those already Invigorated, Bailu extends the duration of their Invigoration by 1 turn. The effect of Invigoration can last for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

skills.name: Gourdful of Elixir
skills.skillContent: After an ally with Invigoration is hit, restores the ally's HP for 4/5/6% of Bailu's Max HP plus 36/144/160. This effect can trigger 2 time(s). When an ally receives a killing blow, they will not be knocked down. Bailu immediately heals the ally for 12/18/19% of Bailu's Max HP plus 120/480/534 HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle.

skills.name: Saunter in the Rain
skills.skillContent: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted Invigoration for 2 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Qihuang Analects
majorTraces.skillContent: When Bailu heals a target ally above their normal Max HP, the target's Max HP increases by 10% for 2 turns.

majorTraces.name: Vidyadhara Ichor Lines
majorTraces.skillContent: Invigoration can trigger 1 more time(s).

majorTraces.name: Aquatic Benediction
majorTraces.skillContent: Characters with Invigoration receive 10% less DMG.

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: War Marshal > Battalia Crush > Savant Providence

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Top-tier AoE damage combined with great single-target damage,
Easy to use and reach his AoE potential (unlike Clara),
Highest skill multipliers in the game currently,
Great at Breaking as each Lightning Lord attack is treated as separate damage instance,
A freaking Stand.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: On auto, Lightning-Lord may attack before getting 6 stacks which will waste the major trace bonus,
130 Ultimate cost means you will need to get 5 energy from somewhere if you want to use his Ultimate every 4 turns - 30 x 4 (from using Skill) + 5 from using Ultimate = 125,
Kinda bad synergy with offensive supports - since you can't target Lightning-Lord, you can't boost it directly with Bronya for example.

skills.name: Glistening Light
skills.skillContent: Jing Yuan deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of his ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Rifting Zenith
skills.skillContent: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 2 for the next turn.

skills.name: Lightbringer
skills.skillContent: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 120/200/216% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 3 for the next turn.

skills.name: Prana Extirpated
skills.skillContent: Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has 60 base SPD and 3 base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as follow-up attacks, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to 33/66/70% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to 25% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy.The Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action can reach a max of 10. Every time Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action increases by 1, its SPD increases by 10. After the Lightning-Lord's action ends, its SPD and Hits Per Action return to their base values.When Jing Yuan is knocked down, the Lightning-Lord will disappear. When Jing Yuan is affected by Crowd Control debuff, the Lightning-Lord is unable to take action.

skills.name: Spirit Invocation
skills.skillContent: After using Jing Yuan's Technique, at the start of the next battle, Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action in the first turn increases by 3.

majorTraces.name: Battalia Crush
majorTraces.skillContent: If the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action is greater or equal to 6 in the next turn, its CRIT DMG increases by 25% for the next turn.

majorTraces.name: Savant Providence
majorTraces.skillContent: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

majorTraces.name: War Marshal
majorTraces.skillContent: After using Skill, CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 2 turn(s).

characters.name: Serval

relic: Band of Sizzling Thunder + Musketeer of Wild Wheat

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

materials: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow x 50

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Amazing character for free,
AoE damage is ridiculous, rivalling even some 5*s,
Very skill point efficient,
Consistent damage over time makes her a reliable teammate.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Her skill AoE only hits 3 targets, so she struggles against waves of more enemies,
Single-target damage is underwhelming.

skills.name: Roaring Thunderclap
skills.skillContent: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Serval's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Lightning Flash
skills.skillContent: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 70/140/154% of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 30/60/66% of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% base chance for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s). While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to 40/104/114% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Here Comes the Mechanical Fever
skills.skillContent: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 108/180/194% of Serval's ATK to all enemies. Enemies already Shocked will extend the duration of their Shock state by 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Galvanic Chords
skills.skillContent: After Serval attacks, deals additional Lightning DMG equal to 36/72/79% of Serval's ATK to all Shocked enemies.

skills.name: Good Night, Belobog
skills.skillContent: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Serval's ATK to a random enemy, with a 100% base chance for all enemies to become Shocked for 3 turn(s). While Shocked, enemies will take Lightning DoT equal to 50% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

majorTraces.name: Rock 'n' Roll
majorTraces.skillContent: Skill has a 20% increased base chance to Shock enemies.

majorTraces.name: String Vibration
majorTraces.skillContent: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

majorTraces.name: Mania
majorTraces.skillContent: Upon defeating an enemy, ATK increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

characters.name: Tingyun

lightCone: Carve the Moon, Weave the Clouds(S1)

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: Jubilant Passage > Nourished Joviality > Knell Subdual

materials: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow x 50

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Arguably the best 4* character on release,
Can funnel other characters energy with ultimate,
Has top tier offensive buffs,
Potential to be very skill point efficient,
Very flexible playstyles.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: She performs best while supporting a hypercarry, as her buffs are single-target.

skills.name: Dislodged
skills.skillContent: Tingyun deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of her ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Soothing Melody
skills.skillContent: Grants a single ally with Benediction to increase their ATK by 25/50/55%, up to 15/25/27% of Tingyun's current ATK. When the ally with Benediction attacks, they will deal Additional Lightning DMG equal to 20/40/44% of that ally's ATK for 1 time. Benediction lasts for 3 turn(s) and is only effective on the most recent receiver of Tingyun's Skill.

skills.name: Amidst the Rejoicing Clouds
skills.skillContent: Regenerates 50 Energy for a single ally and increases the target's DMG by 20/50/56% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Violet Sparknado
skills.skillContent: When an enemy is attacked by Tingyun, the ally with Benediction immediately deals Additional Lightning DMG equal to 30/60/66% of that ally's ATK to the same enemy.

skills.name: Gentle Breeze
skills.skillContent: Tingyun immediately regenerates 50 Energy upon using her Technique.

majorTraces.name: Nourished Joviality
majorTraces.skillContent: Tingyun's SPD increases by 20% for 1 turn after using Skill.

majorTraces.name: Knell Subdual
majorTraces.skillContent: Basic ATK DMG increases by 40%.

majorTraces.name: Jubilant Passage
majorTraces.skillContent: Tingyun immediately regenerates 5 Energy at the start of her turn.

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Absurd offensive buffs,
Likely the best character you can get,
Lots of flexibility due to the turn advance of her skill,
Can happily ignore crit rate.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Not as impactful early on since she’s ultimately an enabler for other damage dealers,
Good luck getting her.

skills.name: Windrider Bullet
skills.skillContent: Deals Wind DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Bronya's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Combat Redeployment
skills.skillContent: Dispels a debuff from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by 33/66/72% for 1 turn(s). When this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.

skills.name: The Belobog March
skills.skillContent: Increases the ATK of all allies by 33/55/59%, and increase their CRIT DMG equal to 12/16/17% of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus 12/20/21% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Leading the Way
skills.skillContent: After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be Advanced Forward by 15/30/33%.

skills.name: Banner of Command
skills.skillContent: After using Bronya's Technique, in the next battle, all allies' ATK increases by 15% for 2 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Command
majorTraces.skillContent: The CRIT Rate for Basic ATK increases to 100%.

majorTraces.name: Battlefield
majorTraces.skillContent: At the start of the battle, all allies' DEF increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Military Might
majorTraces.skillContent: When Bronya is on the field, all allies deal  10% more DMG.

relic: Eagle of Twilight Line + Musketeer of Wild Wheat

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: Faster Than Light > Hidden Dragon > High Gale

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Exceptional starter character that scales easily into endgame,
Phenomenal damage multipliers especially for a 4*,
Consistent source of utility with the slow on skill,
Has rare resistance penetration in his kit, Low cost ultimate.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Cannot proc his own talent without allies,
Steep learning curve for optimal performance.

skills.name: Cloudlancer Art: North Wind
skills.skillContent: Deal Wind DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Dan Heng's ATK to a target enemy.

skills.name: Cloudlancer Art: Torrent
skills.skillContent: Deals Wind DMG equal to 130/260/286% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy. On a CRIT Hit, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the target's SPD by 12% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Ethereal Dream
skills.skillContent: Deals Wind DMG equal to 240/400/432% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy. If the enemy is Slowed, Dan Heng's Ultimate's DMG multiplier increases by 72/120/130%.

skills.name: Superiority of Reach
skills.skillContent: When Dan Heng is the target of an ally's Ability, his next attack's Wind RES PEN increases by 18/36/40%. This effect can be triggered again after 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Splitting Spearhead
skills.skillContent: After Dan Heng uses his Technique, his ATK increases by 40% at the start of the next battle for 3 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Hidden Dragon
majorTraces.skillContent: When current HP percentage is 50% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

majorTraces.name: Faster Than Light
majorTraces.skillContent: After launching an attack, there is a 50% fixed chance to increase own SPD by 20% for 2 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: High Gale
majorTraces.skillContent: Basic ATK deals 40% more damage to Slowed enemies.

relic: Eagle of Twilight Line + Musketeer of Wild Wheat
lightCone: In The Name of the World(S1)

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Excellent breaker unit,
Very strong and consistent damage contribution thanks to his unending DoT,
Potentially very skill point efficient,
Ultimate boosts all forms of DoT including weakness break DoTs.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: There aren’t many characters that can take advantage of his ultimate’s debuff,
Needs a couple of turns at the start to get his DoT going.

skills.name: Dazzling Blades
skills.skillContent: Deals Wind DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Ricochet Love
skills.skillContent: Deals Wind DMG equal to 28/56/62% of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy, and further deals DMG for 4 extra time(s), with each time dealing Wind DMG equal to 28/56/62% of Sampo's ATK to a random enemy.

skills.name: Surprise Present
skills.skillContent: Deals Wind DMG equal to 96/160/172% of Sampo's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance to increase the target's DoT taken by 20/30/32% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Windtorn Dagger
skills.skillContent: Sampo's attacks have a 65% base chance to inflict Wind Shear for 3 turn(s). Enemies inflicted with Wind Shear will take Wind DoT equal to 20/52/57% of Sampo's ATK at the beginning of each turn. Wind Shear can stack up to 5 time(s).

skills.name: Shining Bright
skills.skillContent: After Sampo uses Technique, enemies in a set area are inflicted with Blind for 10 second(s). Blinded enemies cannot detect your team. When initiating combat against a Blinded enemy, there is a 100% fixed chance to delay all enemies' action by 25%.

majorTraces.name: Trap
majorTraces.skillContent: Extends the duration of Wind Shear caused by Talent by 1 turn.

majorTraces.name: Defensive Position
majorTraces.skillContent: Using Ultimate additionally regenerates 10 Energy.

majorTraces.name: Spice Up
majorTraces.skillContent: Enemies with Wind Shear effect deal 15% less damage to Sampo.

relic: Genius of Brilliant Stars + Musketeer of Wild Wheat

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

subStats.title: Major Traces priority:
subStats.stat: Bide Time > Winning Hand > Tile Battle

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Quantum is a rare element, so she gives you a way to deal with foes weak to it,
Can be a good sub-dps that generates skill points.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Using her skill is ill-advised, putting her at a disadvantage compared to other characters,
Inconsistent damage output,
Quite energy hungry and ultimate reliant.

skills.name: Cherry on Top!
skills.skillContent: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 120/240/264% of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it. "Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

skills.name: A Scoop of Moon
skills.skillContent: Immediately draws 2 jade tile(s) and increases DMG by 14/28/31% until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.

skills.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
skills.skillContent: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 120/200/216% of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.

skills.name: Celestial Jade
skills.skillContent: When an ally's turn starts, Qingque randomly draws 1 tile from 3 different suits and can hold up to 4 tiles at one time. If Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the "Hidden Hand" state. While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by 36/72/79%, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!"  The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

skills.name: Game Solitaire
skills.skillContent: After using Technique, Qingque draws 2 jade tile(s) when the battle starts.

majorTraces.name: Tile Battle
majorTraces.skillContent: Restores 1 Skill Point when using the Skill. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per battle.

majorTraces.name: Bide Time
majorTraces.skillContent: Using the Skill increases DMG Boost effect of attacks by an extra 10%.

majorTraces.name: Winning Hand
majorTraces.skillContent: Qingque's SPD increases by 10% for 1 turn after using the Enhanced Basic ATK.

relic: Genius of Brilliant Stars + Musketeer of Wild Wheat

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit DMG = Crit Rate > ATK% > Speed

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Highest unconditional single-target damage potential in the game,
Works astonishingly well in AoE scenarios due to the nature of her kit, making her a rare universal DPS,
Quantum RES PEN allows her to be used effectively even outside of QUA weak foes.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Potentially very skill-point-hungry if she’s too fast,
Good luck pulling for her.

skills.name: Thwack
skills.skillContent: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Sheathed Blade
skills.skillContent: Increases Seele's SPD by 25% for 2 turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to 110/220/242% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Butterfly Flurry
skills.skillContent: Seele enters the buffed state and deals Quantum DMG equal to 255/425/442% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Resurgence
skills.skillContent: Enters the buffed state upon defeating an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and receives an extra turn. While in the buffed state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by 40/80/88% for 1 turn(s). Enemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."

skills.name: Phantom Illusion
skills.skillContent:
After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for 20
 second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the buffed state.

majorTraces.name: Nightshade
majorTraces.skillContent: When current HP percentage is 50% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

majorTraces.name: Lacerate
majorTraces.skillContent: While Seele is in the buffed state, her Quantum RES PEN increases by 20%.

majorTraces.name: Rippling Waves
majorTraces.skillContent: After using a Basic ATK, Seele's next action will be Advanced Forward by 20%.

characters.name: Welt

lightCone: In The Name of the World(S1)

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Crit Rate = Crit DMG > Speed > Effect Hit Rate > ATK%

lightCone: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat(S1)
In The Name of the World(S1)

subStats.title: Substats:
subStats.stat: Effect Hit Rate > Speed > Break Effect

materials: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow x 66

prosAndCons.title: Pros
content: Overloaded kit that does it all,
Great defensive utility with all the slows and delays,
Incomparably role flexible,
The only source of damage amplification, allowing it to stack fully with other debuffs like Pela’s DEF reduction,
Rare element of Imaginary means he’s able to deal with the many foes that are weak to it.

prosAndCons.title: Cons
content: Slowing enemies down may not be optimal if you have an overarching time limit.

skills.name: Gravity Suppression
skills.skillContent: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Edge of the Void
skills.skillContent: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 36/72/79% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG 2 extra times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to 36/72/79% of Welt's ATK to a random enemy. On hit, there is a 65/75/77% base chance to reduce the enemy's SPD by 10% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Synthetic Black Hole
skills.skillContent: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 90/150/162% of Welt's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance for enemies hit by this ability to be Imprisoned for 1 turn. Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by 32/40/42% and SPD reduced by 10%.

skills.name: Time Distortion
skills.skillContent: When hitting an enemy that is already Slowed, Welt deals Additional Imaginary DMG equal to 30/60/66% of his ATK to the enemy.

skills.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
skills.skillContent:
After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for 15 second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by 50%. After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a 100% base chance to Imprison the enemies for 1 turn.
Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by 20% and SPD reduced by 10%. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

majorTraces.name: Retribution
majorTraces.skillContent: When using Ultimate, there is a 100% base chance to increase the DMG received by the targets by 12% for 2 turn(s).

majorTraces.name: Judgment
majorTraces.skillContent: Using Welt's Ultimate additionally regenerates 10 Energy.

majorTraces.name: Punishment
majorTraces.skillContent: Deals 20% more DMG to enemies inflicted with Weakness Break.
